title: I get Aatrox so much in ARAM.
body:
And I figured I should ask you something. I go tank on him. 9/21/0 8.5 AD, 14 armor, 240 HP @18, 5.01 CDR @18, I think 24 mr @18 idk. 

I usually build {{champion:266}} with {{item:1322}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} 
I max Q for engage
It works most of the time, but I was wondering if that's an ok build.
